subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Coach Tom Izzo has directed Michigan State back into the N.C.A.A.’s Round of 16, in which he has a 7-2 record. “March has been good to me,” Izzo says.
snippet: Coach Tom Izzo has directed Michigan State back into the N.C.A.A.’s Round of 16, in which he has a 7-2 record. “March has been good to me,” Izzo says.
